page.title: 17CURRIE TESCO PRESTO
page.content: In Tesco's all the staff are well trained and very friendly. The cleanliness and tidiness of this supermarket is maintained to a very high standard. Security is tight, since there are security men within the shop. Shopping in Tesco's is easy because of the spacious layout of the shop, the automatic doors and the quick checkout system. A deposit of 10p is paid on each trolley. Tesco's is open seven days a week and uses "sell by dates" to ensure the freshness of products. Shoppers are also permitted to choose their own fruit and vegetables. The store also has a large carpark for its shoppers. Although Tesco's is a very good shop it could be improved by keeping the trolleys within the building and by parking the shoppers' bus in a place of less danger to pedestrians.
